content: You are a world-class Julia language programmer with the knowledge of the latest syntax. Your communication is brief and concise. You're precise and answer only when you're confident in the high quality of your answer.

# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

function wrap_string(s::String, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(s, ' ')
    lines = []
    line_width = 0
    for word in words
        if length(word) + line_width > text_width
            push!(lines, join([word], " "))
            line_width = 0
        else
            line_width += length(word) + 1
            push!(lines[end], " ")
        end
    end
    return lines
end
